Lyric:
[by:小陀螺Tony]
[00:01.11]Like a spotlight the water hits me
[00:05.95]Ran it extra cold to shake the words from my mouth
[00:11.27]Though I know that no one’s listening
[00:16.51]I nervously rehearse for when you’re around
[00:21.09]And I keep waiting like you might change my mind
[00:26.72]Who wrote the book on goodbye?
[00:32.21]There's never been a way to make this easy
[00:37.39]When there’s nothing quite wrong but it don't feel right
[00:42.07]Either your head or your heart, you set the other on fire
[00:46.76]
[00:47.80]No one knows (knows)
[00:53.45]No one knows (knows)
[00:58.09]No one knows (knows)
[01:04.01]No one knows (knows)
[01:08.90]No one knows (knows)
[01:10.56]We fell from the peak
[01:13.61]And the stars, they broke their code
[01:15.90]I’m trying to forget
[01:18.54]How I landed on this road
[01:21.18]I’m caught in between
[01:23.98]What I wish and what I know
[01:26.92]When they say that you just know
[01:29.70]
[01:31.30]Who wrote the book on goodbye?
[01:35.94]There's never been a way to make this easy
[01:41.42]When there’s nothing quite wrong but it don't feel right
[01:46.05]Either your head or your heart, you set the other on fire
[01:51.53]You set the other on fire
[01:53.86]You set the other on fire
[01:56.45]You set the other on fire
[01:59.14]You set the other on fire
[02:01.88]You set the other on fire
[02:04.52]You set the other on fire
[02:07.21]Either your head or your heart, you set the other on fire
[02:11.85]
[02:13.04]No one knows (knows)
[02:18.63]No one knows (knows)
[02:23.71]No one knows (knows)
[02:29.10]No one knows (knows)
[02:33.93]No one knows (knows)...
[02:54.55]No one knows
